elements.name: Deleting existing Dev course from db

steps.name: I perform a POST request to "Dev" endpoint "https://tla-school-api.herokuapp.com/api/school/programs/devcourse"
To delete an existing, I perform a DELETE request to "https://tla-school-api.herokuapp.com/api/school/resources/students" using course name parameter
